players.title: CONNECTION
players.content: Connect with talented athlete directly, you can watch their skills through video showreels directly from Surface 1.

players.title: COLLABORATION
players.content: Work with recruiter to increase your chances of finding talented athlete.

players.title: GROWTH
players.content: Save your time, recruit proper athlets for your team.

athletes.title: CONNECTION
athletes.content: Connect with coaches directly, you can ping coaches to view profile.

athletes.title: COLLABORATION
athletes.content: Work with other student athletes to increase visability. When you share and like other players videos it will increase your visability as a player. This is the team work aspect to Surface 1.

athletes.title: GROWTH
athletes.content: Resources and tools for you to get better as a student Athelte. Access to training classes, tutor sessions, etc
